pageContext.claim: “India called us the other day they said would like to start doing a trade deal first time they wouldn't talk about it with previous administrations.”
pageContext.analysis: Previous administrations have expanded the U.S.-India economic relationship, helping make India the U.S.'s 9th largest trading partner. Under the Bush administration, the two countries set up the India-U.S. Trade Policy Forum, which was reaffirmed under Obama.
